output.dependency: The title of the movie (column 1) is dependent on the director (column 4) as it represents the work of the director.
The column representing the primary actor (column 5) is dependent on the column representing other actors (column 6) since the primary actor is part of the broader cast.
The year of release (column 2) has a potential dependency on the release date string (column 3), as the release date must correspond to the year given.
The country of production (column 9) is dependent on the location (column 15), indicating that the movies are produced in the USA as stated.
The genre of the movie (column 14) may inform us about the theme or subject of the movie (column 16), suggesting a relationship between the two.
